Some people may disagree with me on this title, saying that the story is way to hateful to be enjoyable and that the characters are too vulgar, but if you like films filled with pranks and enough humorous lines thrown in the story with participants found both silly and ingenious then you'll love Les Valse

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The peculiarity starts when the sky turns red during the full moon. A short story by Stephen King, released as an adaptation to this movie.
